    • Uses of UCIEngine in net.viktorc.detroid.framework.engine

      Classes in net.viktorc.detroid.framework.engine that implement UCIEngine 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Detroid
      A UCI compatible, tunable chess engine that utilizes magic bit boards and most search heuristics and supports Polyglot opening books.

    • Uses of UCIEngine in net.viktorc.detroid.framework.gui

      Methods in net.viktorc.detroid.framework.gui with parameters of type UCIEngine 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void GUI.setEngines(ControllerEngine controllerEngine, UCIEngine searchEngine)
      Sets the chess engines powering the GUI application.

    • Uses of UCIEngine in net.viktorc.detroid.framework.gui.controllers

      Constructors in net.viktorc.detroid.framework.gui.controllers with parameters of type UCIEngine 
      Constructor and Description
      MainController(Stage stage, ControllerEngine controllerEngine, UCIEngine searchEngine)
      Constructs an instance using the specified engines for game control and searching.

    • Uses of UCIEngine in net.viktorc.detroid.framework.gui.dialogs

      Constructors in net.viktorc.detroid.framework.gui.dialogs with parameters of type UCIEngine 
      Constructor and Description
      OptionsAlert(Stage owner, UCIEngine engine)
      Constructs an instance based on the UCI option offered by the chess engine.

    • Uses of UCIEngine in net.viktorc.detroid.framework.tuning

      Subinterfaces of UCIEngine in net.viktorc.detroid.framework.tuning 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  TunableEngine
      An interface for a tunable chess engine whose parameters can be retrieved.

    • Uses of UCIEngine in net.viktorc.detroid.framework.validation

      Subinterfaces of UCIEngine in net.viktorc.detroid.framework.validation 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ControllerEngine
      An interface for an engine that provides the basic functionalities required for a user interface base engine.
